title: Po Po Yen Lyrics A H Kaashif
stanzas: <div>Po Po En ft Sid Sriram Lyrics A H Kaashif

Po po en
idhayam tharaiyil
vilundhu sidhari pogattum

Po po en
nizhalum pirindhu
ennai thanimai aakkattum

kovam un kovam
en nenjai kondru poga.
kangal en kangal
kanneeril nenaiyuthe

podhum podhum
eppodhum un ninaivugal
paavam en ullaam
sollaamal karaiyuthe

kaayathai kankondu
paarthid mudiyum
valiyai kandida kangal illai.

Po po en
idhayam tharaiyil
vilundhu sidhari pogattum

Po po en
nizhalum pirindhu
ennai thanimai aakkattum

yaeno ennai mattum
vazhkai kolluthadi
naanthaan enna seyya
ellaam kaivandhu
poguthadi.

nee en arugile
irundha podhu parandhavan
nee en tholaivile
pirindhapodhu sidhainthavan

yaedhum ennodu
illaamal pogattum
nee en kaikorthu
vazhnthaal podhume
category: Song:Po Po En - ft Sid Sriram
